main_definition: Standards refer to established criteria or levels of quality, performance, or excellence that are used as a basis for judgment or comparison.

meanings_and_examples.example: The company sets high standards for customer service to ensure satisfaction.
The industry has strict safety standards that all workers must adhere to.
His work meets the highest academic standards for research in his field.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Standards are established guidelines that dictate behavior, performance, and expectations.
meanings_and_examples.example: The school has clear standards for student conduct to maintain a respectful learning environment.
